alert.note: Alert for Scott; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 14 at 7:15AM CST until December 14 at 7:45AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM CST FOR SMITH AND SOUTHEASTERN SCOTT COUNTIES... At 715 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Burns to 7 miles southwest of Raleigh, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Burns around 720 AM CST. Homewood around 725 AM CST. Pineville around 740 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Sylvarena and Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CST for central and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
